name: Super Mahjong 2: Honkaku 4Jin Uchi
overview: Super Mahjong 2: Honkaku 4Jin Uchi ("Super Mahjong 2: Real 4-Player Strike") is a mahjong game from I'Max and the sequel to Super Mahjong. As its subtitle attests, Super Mahjong 2 allows for a full four-person game of mahjong as opposed to the two-person limitation of its predecessor. The opponents are no longer based on real people, but are still somewhat comical in their implementation. The game also takes a leaf from Super Nichibutsu Mahjong's book by adding bunny girls to many of its menus. There was one more Super Mahjong game for the Super Famicom: Super Mahjong 3. Like most mahjong games, Super Mahjong 2 was never released outside of Japan.
